description: Try our easy to follow Chinese-Style Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: ChineseStyle Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in the wok. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 10 seconds. Add the cooked rice and stirfry for 2 minutes, until lightly toasted. Stir in the peas and spring onions and cook for 2 minutes. Add prawns, soy sauce, egg and bacon until heated through and combined. Serve.
